channel.title: Legends' Quest
channel.description:
Well I got a clue scroll requiring me to go into kharazi's jungle, meaning I have to do Legends' quest.
I'll keep this thread updated as much as possible.
Quests needed: Heroes' Quest Family Crest Shilo Village Underground Pass Waterfall 108 Quest Points
Skills needed: 58/56 Magic 60/52 Mining 50/50 Agility 50/50 Crafting 48/50 Smithing 71/50 Strength 46/50 Thieving 90/50 Woodcutting 45/45 Herblore 47/42 Prayer
Suggestions would be nice.
Will do Smithing when I get back from the movies tonight.

item.title: Legends' Quest
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

[quote=“riku9182, post:9, topic:382163”][quote author=n10si t link=topic=477965.msg3497618#msg3497618 date=1297467373]

Herblore is soooo easy.
I went from 25-56 in 2 hour’s legit

I just went 31-39 ~ 15 minutes. It’s just expensive, is the problem.
[/quote]
Energy Potion’s FTW[/quote]

That’s what I’m doing, but remember I’m poor now. Lol. Bye bye 740k.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:

IlikeArrays:

quest is easy, did it in an hour. You will have no trouble.

I’m sure my biggest problem will be doing all those quests I need

item.title: Legends' Quest
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

[quote=“riku9182, post:5, topic:382163”]Herblore is soooo easy.
I went from 25-56 in 2 hour’s legit[/quote]

I just went 31-39 ~ 15 minutes. It’s just expensive, is the problem. Cost me 740k for what I’m using to get to 45. (687 unf harra pots and 687 choc dust)

Read full topic

item.title: Legends' Quest
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Oh. The reason I ask is because I had one in the herblore habitat (which is also in the Kharazi jungle), but you don’t need to do any quests for it because there is a teleport to it. (Even though I have done legends :P)

Read full topic

item.title: Legends' Quest
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

Davidi2:

Which clue is it?

Degree, says this:

08 degrees 26 minutes south
10 degrees 28 minutes east

RuneHQ tells me:
** In the Kharazi Jungle, dig near a corpse on the small peninsula in the southwestern corner. The Legends’ Quest is required to do this clue scroll.

Read full topic
